meanings.def: either of the two round soft parts at the front of a woman’s body that produce milk when she has had a baby
examples: She put the baby to her breast.
breast cancer
The protective benefits of breast milk are numerous for both mother and baby.
She had breast-augmentation surgery.
Getting breast implants entails major surgery.
The book promoted the benefits of breast feeding to child health.
She discovered a lump in her breast.

meanings.def: the similar, smaller part on a man’s body, which does not produce milk
the top part of the front of your body, below your neck
examples: He cradled the child against his breast.

meanings.def: the part of a piece of clothing that covers your chest
examples: A row of medals was pinned to the breast of his coat.

meanings.def: the front part of a bird’s body
examples: breast feathers
The robin has a red breast.
a robin with a red breast

meanings.def: meat from the front part of the body of a bird or an animal
examples: chicken/turkey breasts
breast of lamb
breast of duck in orange sauce
fried chicken breasts

meanings.def: having the type of chest or breasts mentioned
examples: a small-breasted/full-breasted woman
bare-breasted
the yellow-breasted male of the species

meanings.def: the part of the body where the feelings and emotions are thought to be
examples: a troubled breast

meanings.def: to show that you feel sorry about something that you have done, especially in public and in an exaggerated way
to tell the truth about something so that you no longer feel guilty
examples: He made a clean breast of everything and admitted taking the money.

idioms.def: to show that you feel sorry about something that you have done, especially in public and in an exaggerated way

idioms.idiom: make a clean breast of something
idioms.def: to tell the truth about something so that you no longer feel guilty
examples: He made a clean breast of everything and admitted taking the money.

meanings.def: to reach the top of a hill, etc.
examples: As they breasted the ridge, they saw the valley and lake before them.

meanings.def: to push through something, touching it with your chest
examples: He strode into the ocean, breasting the waves.
